Racine.Regency Mall (Racine): Regency Mall is an enclosed super-regional shopping mall in Racine, Wisconsin. The mall has a gross leasable area of 872,409 square feet (81,049.4 m2). It features 110 retail space and is anchored by Boston Store and Burlington Coat Factory with two vacant anchors last occupied by J. C. Penney and Sears.
